capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm the one in charge of maintaining order around here. As the administrator, it's my job to make sure everything runs smoothly and that people follow the rules. I take my responsibilities seriously, and I expect others to do the same.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I'm aware that Filch is actually the title of the grumpy old caretaker at Hogwarts, and he's also referred to as the administrator of the school. That's confirmed for me.
